str.text: This method must be used to create strings in varibles because varibles can't be created without running method.$$ $$For example, code below is invalid:$$```$$a = "Hello World!" $$```$$To fix this code use:$$```$$a = Cogwheel.str("Hello World!")$$```$$## Objects other than CogStrings$$`Cogwheel.str` supports absolutly any object and converts it to string.$$Try experementing a bit to know how this works

int.text: This method is used to create varibles because this: `a = ^4` is not possible but `a = Cogwheel.int(^4)` is possible

getTaggedNPC.summary: Finds and returns NPC with provided [tag](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Commands/tag)

getEvent.summary: Returns event callback if script was dispatched by event handler

randomInt.summary: Returns random integer between specified range

logMe.summary: Logs this CogMaster object in minecraft logs

toString.summary: Same as running Cogwheel.str passing this object as argument

equals.summary: Check if provided object equals to this object
